select.foreach:
select #{type} as type, count(case when result=0 then 1 end) as success_num, count(case when result=1 then 1 end) as fail_num, count(*) as total_num, ifnull(min(delay_time),0) as min_delay_time, ifnull(max(delay_time),0) as max_delay_time, avg(ifnull(delay_time,0)) as avg_delay_time from mail_info sms_info wechat_info application_info
transmit_time >= #{statisticsReqDTO.startTime} and
#{statisticsReqDTO.endTime} >= transmit_time and

select.if:
select r.app_name, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='短信' then 1 end),0) as sms_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='App' then 1 end),0) as app_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='邮件' then 1 end),0) as mail_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='公众号' then 1 end),0) as wechat_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type is not null then 1 end),0) as total_num, ifnull(sum(case when result=0 then 1 end),0) as success_num, ifnull(sum(case when result=1 then 1 end),0) as fail_num, ifnull(min(delay_time),0) as min_delay_time, ifnull(max(delay_time),0) as max_delay_time, avg(ifnull(delay_time,0)) as avg_delay_time from (select '短信' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from sms_info UNION ALL select 'App' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from application_info UNION ALL select '邮件' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from mail_info UNION ALL select '公众号' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from wechat_info) as r
r.app_id=#{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.appId} and
r.type=#{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.type} and
r.transmit_time >= #{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.startTime} and
#{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.endTime} >= r.transmit_time and
having GROUP_CONCAT("|",r.app_name,"|",to_pinyin(r.app_name),"|",pinyin(Num_char_extract(r.app_name,3)),"|",Num_char_extract(r.app_name,2),"|") like "%"#{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.appName}"%"

if.foreach:
select r.app_name, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='短信' then 1 end),0) as sms_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='App' then 1 end),0) as app_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='邮件' then 1 end),0) as mail_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type='公众号' then 1 end),0) as wechat_send_num, ifnull(sum(case when r.type is not null then 1 end),0) as total_num, ifnull(sum(case when result=0 then 1 end),0) as success_num, ifnull(sum(case when result=1 then 1 end),0) as fail_num, ifnull(min(delay_time),0) as min_delay_time, ifnull(max(delay_time),0) as max_delay_time, avg(ifnull(delay_time,0)) as avg_delay_time from (select '短信' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from sms_info UNION ALL select 'App' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from application_info UNION ALL select '邮件' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from mail_info UNION ALL select '公众号' as type,app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time from wechat_info) as r
r.app_id=#{app.id} and
r.app_name=#{app.appName} and
r.type=#{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.type} and
r.transmit_time >= #{conditionStatisticsReqDTO.startTime} and

mapper.select:
select r.provider_name, count(case when r.result=0 then 1 end) as success_num, count(case when r.result=1 then 1 end) as fail_num, count(*) as total_num, ROUND(count(case when r.result=0 then 1 end) / count(*) * 100, 2) as accuracy, ifnull(min(delay_time),0) as min_delay_time, ifnull(max(delay_time),0) as max_delay_time, avg(ifnull(delay_time,0)) as avg_delay_time from (select app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time,provider_name from sms_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time,provider_name from application_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time,provider_name from mail_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay_time,transmit_time,wechat_name as provider_name from wechat_info) as r
transmit_time >= #{startTime} and
#{endTime} >= transmit_time and
group by r.provider_name
